languages.text: "Знаешь другой способ подгонять ленивых тварей? Так делись! Если проверка заметит отсутствие блока на щит-станции — донесет Владайму. Если Владайм узнает — церемониться не будет. Сделает нам "увольнение по-касбаллитски". То есть — пинок в мусоросброс без скафа!"

"You know another way to get the lazy brutes to shift themselves? Well, I'm all ears! If the inspection sees a circuit station without a unit, they'll go to Vladaym with this. And if Vladaym finds out, he won't mince words. He'll give us the old 'Kasballican severance.' As in, kick us out the trash chute without a void suit!"
languages.original_text: "Знаешь другой способ подгонять ленивых тварей? Так делись! Если проверка заметит отсутствие блока на щит-станции — донесет Владайму. Если Владайм узнает — церемониться не будет. Сделает нам "увольнение по-касбаллитски". То есть — пинок в мусоросброс без скафа!"

traits.locale_text: "You know another way of making lazy slobs hustle? Well, share it then! If the inspection sees a circuit station without a unit — they'll go to Vladaym with this. And if Vladaym finds out, he won't mince words. He'll give us the old 'Kasballican severance.' As in, kick us out the trash chute without a void suit!"

"You know another way of making lazy slobs hustle? Well, share it then! If the inspection sees a circuit station without a unit — they'll go to Vladaym with this. And if Vladaym finds out, he won't mince words. He'll give us the old 'Kasballican severance.' As in, kick us out the trash chute without a void suit!"

"You know another way to get the lazy brutes to shift themselves? Well, I'm all ears! If the inspection sees a circuit station without a unit, they'll go to Vladaym with this. And if Vladaym finds out, he won't mince words. He'll give us the old 'Kasballican severance.' As in, kick us out the trash chute without a void suit!"

"You know another way to get the lazy brutes to shift themselves? Well, I'm all ears! If the inspection sees a circuit station without a unit, they'll go to Vladaym with this. And if Vladaym finds out, he won't mince words. He'll give us the old 'Kasballican severance.' As in, kick us out the trash chute without a void suit!"

"You know another way to get the lazy brutes to shift themselves? Well, I'm all ears! If the inspection sees a circuit station without a unit, they'll go to Vladaym with this. And if Vladaym finds out, he won't mince words. He'll give us the old 'Kasballican severance.' As in, kick us out the trash chute without a void suit!"

languages.text: “那你还有别的办法，让这群懒鬼自己动起来吗？要是有，可得和我说说！要是让检查组的人发现电站的设备全都没了，他们肯定会向弗拉迪姆告状。要是弗拉迪姆知道了，他恐怕根本不会多说废话，干脆来个卡斯巴利卡式遣散，直接把我们一脚从气闸里踢出去，连虚空服都不给穿。”
languages.original_text: "You know another way to get the lazy brutes to shift themselves? Well, I'm all ears! If the inspection sees a circuit station without a unit, they'll go to Vladaym with this. And if Vladaym finds out, he won't mince words. He'll give us the old 'Kasballican severance.' As in, kick us out the trash chute without a void suit!"

traits.locale_text: “那你还有别的办法，让这群懒鬼自己动起来吗？要是有，可得和我说说！要是让检查组的人发现电站的设备全都没了，他们肯定会向弗拉迪姆告状。要是弗拉迪姆知道了，他恐怕根本不会多说废话，干脆来个卡斯巴利卡式遣散，直接把我们一脚从气闸里踢出去，连虚空服都不给穿。”

languages.text: «¿Se te ocurre alguna otra forma de hacer que estos vagos aceleren un poco? ¡Porque soy todo oídos! Como la inspección vea un centro de circuitos sin unidad, se lo contarán a Vladaym. Y Vladaym no es de los que se andan con rodeos. Nos dará el "despido a la Kasballica". ¡Ya sabes, por la esclusa de residuos y sin traje!».
languages.original_text: "You know another way to get the lazy brutes to shift themselves? Well, I'm all ears! If the inspection sees a circuit station without a unit, they'll go to Vladaym with this. And if Vladaym finds out, he won't mince words. He'll give us the old 'Kasballican severance.' As in, kick us out the trash chute without a void suit!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Se te ocurre alguna otra forma de hacer que estos vagos aceleren un poco? ¡Porque soy todo oídos! Como la inspección vea un centro de circuitos sin unidad, se lo contarán a Vladaym. Y Vladaym no es de los que se andan con rodeos. Nos dará el "despido a la Kasballica". ¡Ya sabes, por la esclusa de residuos y sin traje!».

languages.text: 「他にどうすりゃさっさと動くんだよ？知ってるなら教えろ！検査部がユニットのない回路ステーションを見つけたらヴラダイムに報告されちまう。ヴラダイムにバレたら説教じゃ済まされない。"カスバリカの退職金"って言って、俺たちヴォイドスーツなしでゴミ処理場送りにするぞ！」
languages.original_text: "You know another way to get the lazy brutes to shift themselves? Well, I'm all ears! If the inspection sees a circuit station without a unit, they'll go to Vladaym with this. And if Vladaym finds out, he won't mince words. He'll give us the old 'Kasballican severance.' As in, kick us out the trash chute without a void suit!"

traits.locale_text: 「他にどうすりゃさっさと動くんだよ？知ってるなら教えろ！検査部がユニットのない回路ステーションを見つけたらヴラダイムに報告されちまう。ヴラダイムにバレたら説教じゃ済まされない。"カスバリカの退職金"って言って、俺たちヴォイドスーツなしでゴミ処理場送りにするぞ！」

languages.text: "Kennt Ihr eine andere Methode, die faulen Säcke in Bewegung zu bringen? Ich bin ganz Ohr! Wenn die Inspektion auf eine Wachstation ohne Einheit stößt, wird sie das Vladaym melden. Und wenn Vladaym davon erfährt, ist es mit einer Standpauke nicht getan. Wir kriegen die alte 'Kasballica-Abfindung'. Sprich Müllschlucker ohne Raumanzug!"
languages.original_text: "You know another way to get the lazy brutes to shift themselves? Well, I'm all ears! If the inspection sees a circuit station without a unit, they'll go to Vladaym with this. And if Vladaym finds out, he won't mince words. He'll give us the old 'Kasballican severance.' As in, kick us out the trash chute without a void suit!"

traits.locale_text: "Kennt Ihr eine andere Methode, die faulen Säcke in Bewegung zu bringen? Ich bin ganz Ohr! Wenn die Inspektion auf eine Wachstation ohne Einheit stößt, wird sie das Vladaym melden. Und wenn Vladaym davon erfährt, ist es mit einer Standpauke nicht getan. Wir kriegen die alte 'Kasballica-Abfindung'. Sprich Müllschlucker ohne Raumanzug!"

languages.text: « Parce que tu connais un autre moyen de secouer cette bande d'incapables, toi ? Vas-y, je t'écoute ! Si les inspecteurs trouvent une station-circuit sans unité, ils le signaleront à Vladaym. Et si Vladaym l'apprend, il ne mâchera pas ses mots. Peut-être même qu'il nous fera le coup de la "rupture à la Kasballicane"... C'est-à-dire nous balancer dans le conduit à ordure sans scaphandre ! »
languages.original_text: "You know another way to get the lazy brutes to shift themselves? Well, I'm all ears! If the inspection sees a circuit station without a unit, they'll go to Vladaym with this. And if Vladaym finds out, he won't mince words. He'll give us the old 'Kasballican severance.' As in, kick us out the trash chute without a void suit!"

traits.locale_text: « Parce que tu connais un autre moyen de secouer cette bande d'incapables, toi ? Vas-y, je t'écoute ! Si les inspecteurs trouvent une station-circuit sans unité, ils le signaleront à Vladaym. Et si Vladaym l'apprend, il ne mâchera pas ses mots. Peut-être même qu'il nous fera le coup de la "rupture à la Kasballicane"... C'est-à-dire nous balancer dans le conduit à ordure sans scaphandre ! »

languages.text: "Bu tembel tenekeleri kımıldatacak başka yol mu biliyorsun? Biliyorsan söyle! Teftiş, devre istasyonunda çalışan bir birim göremezse hemen Vladaym'a yetiştirir. Vladaym da sözünü sakınmaz. Bizimle 'Kasballica usulü' yollarını ayırır, yani uçsuz giysisine sokmadan hepimizi çöp oluğundan fırlatır!"
languages.original_text: "You know another way to get the lazy brutes to shift themselves? Well, I'm all ears! If the inspection sees a circuit station without a unit, they'll go to Vladaym with this. And if Vladaym finds out, he won't mince words. He'll give us the old 'Kasballican severance.' As in, kick us out the trash chute without a void suit!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu tembel ahmakların kımıldamasını sağlayacak başka bir yol biliyor musun? Biliyorsan söyle! Teftişte devre istasyonunda çalışan bir birim görmezlerse hemen Vladaym'a yetiştirirler. Vladaym bunu duyarsa sözünü sakınmaz. 'Kasballica darbesi'ni kafamıza indiriverir, yani hepimizi uçsuz tulumlarımız olmadan çöp oluğuna fırlatır!"
